author: tatuvlakia
title: Curved Tracks, not much else
review:
Well, not much to be said about these, just curved track sections.

You did get a lot of white 2x8 plates with your tracks, and these could be used in anything being just regular Lego plates. The same cannot be said for tracks these days.

You did have to spend a lot more time setting these up, but the added flexibility was a real tangible bonus back then when my collection was limited!
